name: Artificial Intelligence prototype
description:
I made this in Scratch. To avoid legal issues I will not be providing the download for the Scratch offline editor. The online version was compiled in Phosphorus.

This project is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 license. 

Please contact me if you find any bugs. Here is the link to the online version. Press space, then have a conversation.  Press the upvote if it gives a good response. That makes it more likely to give that response if you say the same thing. It has been playtested and sh*tposted into by my friends. Almost nothing is capitalized because I thought it treated capitals and lowercase differently. Use the offline version if you want it to save your responses.
